name: Lucid (itch) (Caliban)
description:
Lucid is a surreal adventure game created in the Twine, choice based format where you will explore a city at night, strugging to overcome bad memories and outrun the darkness.

At once familiar and strange, comforting and threatening, a weird, atmospheric walk in the dark where death offers no release. 

Break free from the nightmare or stumble through the streets forever.

The game takes between 30 minutes and 1 hour to complete for most players.  You are recommended to download rather than run it from the page, but if you do play it straight from this page it will automatically open in fullscreen mode.
